text: niyata vaśayenma num̆balā veta ohu tahanam kara ættē maḷa dǣ, rudhiraya, śūkara māṁśa hā kavara deyak allāh novana dǣṭa kapana laddē da ēvāya. namut kavareku hō bala karanu læbuvē nam ohu sīmāva ikmavanneku hā abibavā noyanneku lesin tora va (eya anubhava kirīmaṭa anumætiya æta.) niyata vaśayenma allāh ati kṣamāśīlī karuṇā guṇayen yuktaya
